headline: The Case for American Water Works Company (AWK) in a Value-Oriented Dividend Portfolio
summary: American Water Works Company, Inc. (NYSE:AWK) is included among the 11 Best Value Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. American Water Works Company, Inc. headline: American Water Participates in Source Water Protection Week
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., September 29, 2025--American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., today announced its participation in American Water Works Association’s (AWWA) annual Source Water Protection Week, September 28 - October 4, 2025.
